titleStmt.title: A question vvether there bee nothing new : being one of those questions handled in the weekly conferences of Monsieur Renaudots Bureau d'Addresses, at Paris / translated into English, anno 1640.
titleStmt.author: Renaudot, Théophraste, 1586-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.B. for Iasper Emery, at the Eagle and Child in Saint Pauls Church-yard, neere Saint Augustines Gate,

notesStmt.note: Imprint date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).

Reproduction of original in the British Library.
